item.description:
Want to mingle, get into shape and have a blast while staying warm this winter? Come join us each week for the fun. No partner required. This dance attracts singles and couples and everyone dances with everyone.
There's a group lesson each week before the dance begins so beginners can learn the simple steps and dance all night to terrific bands or DJ Alan.
Come join the friendly atmosphere and fun. Lots of very folks come weekly. Come as you are or dress up. Please wear comfortable foot wear. It also get's pretty warm dancing so I suggest wearing layers to peel off.
I'll be working the door during part of the evening but will have the chance to dance and mingle. I haven't danced in awhile so going tonight for that lesson;-). Hope to see you there!!!!

Just some swingin' stuff we'd like you to know about...

If the weather is nasty and you're unsure if we're having a dance, here's a few ways to find out:
If we are going to cancel a dance, it will be posted on the "home page" of our website (be sure to refresh your browser) www.dance2dance.com ~ and/or ~ you can always call at 978-263-7220.

It's that time of year again when the nasty weather is upon us! Yuck!!!
Please bring a clean dry pair of dance shoes with, it helps preserve the dance floor. If you could wipe your feet on the mats in the foyer before you step into the hall that also helps preserve the floor. Thank You!

The Elks is air conditioned and offers a large floor, great crowd, great atmosphere and great bar!

If you would like us to email you a flyer to put up at work (or someplace you think would help us out) just email Luan at dance2swing@comcast.net. It can be sent in microsoft word format. Thanks
Share D2S with your friends. Below there is an option where you can forward this email to a friend. Please take advantage of it and help us promote swing!!! Share the fun with others!!!

 

6pm ~ Doors Open
6:30pm (may start a little late) ~ Beginner Friendly Swing Dance Lesson
7:30pm ~ Swing Dance to band to be announced each week.
Admission ~ $12
Come with or without a partner!
No experience necessary!

Directions: From Rt. 2, East or West, take Ex 31A. That will put you on Rt. 12 South, go through three sets of lights, Elks is on your right. From Worcester take I-190 to Rt 2 West then follow above directions.
item.why: This week's band on Sunday, 2/20/2011 is BJ Magoon & Driving Sideways

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Sunday Night Swing Dances at the Leominster Elks
